extendedInfo.description: Word App is a word generator using the CSW12 (270163 words!), SOWPODS or TWL06 word lists, used in tournament Scrabble.Easily check a word is valid for the selected word list. Search for words that can be made from entered letters, and more with multiple search types.For Scrabble players to crossword solvers. ** Pro version available with no ads** News and FAQ at:** funqai.com/and_wordapp.htmlFAQThese words arn't really words / A common word is not included.There are a great many words in use in the english language and I cannot hope to please everyone as to their definition of what is a word or not. The 3 dictionaries offered to use are official word lists used in tournament Scrabble. I think if anyone knows whether a word should be in or out of an application like this then it's these guys.The word wont work in game X.See above. It's not up to me to tell other developers which word list to choose. I think I've chosen the right ones.It's not finding any words.Do you have your search type set correctly for what you are trying to do? Chances are you want the 'Build' search type.

reviews.title: Neat app
reviews.comment: Should automatically revert from definition screen to word list when a new search is done. Took me a while to realize that was the problem, thought it wasn\'t finding any words. Also, kind of a big price premium for the convenience of having an in app definition as opposed to having to do a Web search or using a separate dictionary app. Perhaps a rhyming lookup feature could be added to help justify the price.
reviews.author: Steven J

reviews.title: Thanks
reviews.comment: This came very useful for a task I had. App ran smooth and solved my issue.
reviews.author: Bobby Harroald

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: It sucks and their are better apps that are also free.

reviews.title: Samsung Tab 7.0 Plus
reviews.comment: App works very well. I like the exhaustive search criteria of anagram, pattern and build. Solves all my problems . Kudos.
reviews.author: Gerald Gathuto

reviews.title: Wapp
reviews.comment: This excellent app is now in line with the new Collins Word List which came into force on 1st Jan 2012.  No Scrabble enthusiast can really do without this flawless app.

reviews.title: BEST. HELPER. EVAR.
